shaping.name: Shaping
shaping.description: The ability to shape mana, a key element of magical practice

alteration.name: Alteration
alteration.description: Shifting the form of objects and terrain

animation.name: Animation
animation.description: Animating objects by imbuing them with the casters will

cryomancy.name: Cryomancy
cryomancy.description: Sub-domain of alteration specializing in ice magic

divination.name: Divination
divination.description: Information gathering magic, difficult but not mana intensive

electromancy.name: Electromancy
electromancy.description: Sub-domain of Projection concerning electric energy

golemancy.name: Golemancy
golemancy.description: Creating mindless golems (requires Animation 3, Spell Formula 5)

medicalMagic.name: Medical Magic
medicalMagic.description: Nascent field created after the Silence for diagnosis and treatment

mentalDefense.name: Mental Defense
mentalDefense.description: Protection of the mind from outside influence

projection.name: Projection
projection.description: Creating light, sound, heat, and electricity

pyromancy.name: Pyromancy
pyromancy.description: Summoning and controlling fire, sub-domain of Projection

warding.name: Warding
warding.description: Creating permanent or semi-permanent defenses in fixed locations

alchemy.name: Alchemy
alchemy.description: Field of magic requiring no shaping skills, involving potion creation

conjuration.name: Magic Missile
conjuration.description: A basic damaging bolt of magical force. Mana Cost: 4+2 per Level. Cast Time: 50-5 per Tier TU (min 5). Range: 60+10 per Level feet. Damage: 15+7.5 per Level Blunt

conjuration.name: Force Shield
conjuration.description: Transparent shield of magical force. Reaction. Mana Cost: 1-0.05 per Level per damage blocked (min 0.05). Max damage blocked: 10 per Level

conjuration.name: Aegis
conjuration.description: Full dome shield of magical force. Channeled. Requires Conjuration Level 5. Mana Cost: 0.85-0.1 per Level per damage blocked (min 0.03). Cast Time: 50-10 per Tier TU (min 3). Range: 5+5 per Tier feet. Radius: max 2.5 per Tier feet

conjuration.name: Floating Disc
conjuration.description: Simple plane of force to carry weight. Channeled. Mana Cost: 20/Hour. Cast Time: 200 TU. Range: 5 feet. Carry: 100+75 per Tier pounds. Speed: 4+3 per Tier. Radius: 3+1 per Tier feet (max 8)

conjuration.name: Force Lance
conjuration.description: Powerful piercing force attack. Mana Cost: 15+5 per Level. Cast Time: 80-8 per Tier TU (min 8). Range: 100+15 per Level feet. Damage: 30+15 per Level Piercing. Special: Reduces Force Shield/Aegis Level by 2+1 per Tier

conjuration.name: Force Whip
conjuration.description: Conjured whips of magical force. Channeled. Takes 3 Channel slots. Mana Cost: 17+8 per Tier. Cast Time: 80-8 per Tier. Range: 10 feet. Damage: 16+7 per Level (slashing/piercing/blunt choice). Attack every 40-2 per Tier TU

conjuration.name: Simulacrum
conjuration.description: Create autonomous copy sharing soul and mana. Channeled. Requires Soul Magic Level 3. Mana Cost: 25/Hour. Cast Time: 600 TU. Range: 5 feet

conjuration.name: Static Force Shield
conjuration.description: Force Shield variant with initial mana investment instead of ongoing cost. Acts as Enhancer for Force Shield Checks equal to or less than this Skills Level

negation.name: Basic Dispelling Wave
negation.description: Projects disruptive magic wave. Mana Cost: 10+5 per Level. Cast Time: 50-10 per Tier TU (min 10). Cone: 10+5 per Tier feet long, 5+2.5 per Tier feet wide. Non-channeled spells use only spell Level to resist

negation.name: Targeted Dispel
negation.description: Disrupt casting of specific spell. Mana Cost: 40% of target spell cost+2 per Tier. Cast Time: 50-10 per Tier TU (min 5). Range: 30+10 per Level feet. Must complete at most 5 TU before target spell. Contested Check

alteration.name: Create Mud Men
alteration.description: Create and control mud people. Channeled, Vulnerable. Requires Alteration Level 3, Animation Level 4. Mana Cost: 10 per mud man. Cast Time: 100+50 per additional TU-10 per Level (min 15). Range: 10 feet. Max: 1 per Tier. Possess all users unarmed Skills

alteration.name: Instant Pit
alteration.description: Creates pit in earth. Mana Cost: 5. Cast Time: 20-2 per Level TU (min 2). Range: 30+10 per Tier feet

alteration.name: Raise Earthen Bindings
alteration.description: Earth rises to entangle enemies. Mana Cost: 8+3 per Level per binding. Cast Time: 30-4 per Tier TU (min 4)+15-2 per Tier per extra binding (min 2). Range: 50+15 per Level feet. Bind 1 per Tier. Binding Health: 15+5 per Level. Armor: 8+2 per Tier True, 10 Lightning

alteration.name: Raise Earthen Spears
alteration.description: Earth spears up at enemies. Mana Cost: 5+2.25 per Level per spear. Cast Time: 100-8 per Tier TU (min 10). Range: 30+5 per Level feet. Create 1 per Tier. Damage: 18+4 per Level Piercing, 8+2.5 per Level Blunt per spear

alteration.name: Raise Earthen Wall
alteration.description: Creates wall of dirt and stone. Cast Time: 80-10 per Tier TU (min 8). Range: 30+5 per Level feet. Dimensions: 5+3 per Tier width, 10+5 per Level length, 10+2 per Level height. Health per 5ft segment: 50+15 per Level. Armor: 12+3 per Tier True, 10 Lightning

animation.name: Homing Magic Missile
animation.description: Magic Missile variation with homing effect. Acts as Enhancer to Magic Missile Skill when making contested check

animation.name: Puppeteer
animation.description: Puppeteer a target. Channeled, Vulnerable. Requires Animation Level 2. Level 4 for unwilling targets. Mana Cost: 25/Hour unresisted or 25/600 TU resisted. Cast Time: 100-10 per Tier TU (min 8). Range: 10+10 per Tier feet. Target cannot cast magic, uses casters Skills

bloodMagic.name: Blood for Mana
bloodMagic.description: Convert lifeforce to mana. Extremely damaging to health. Rate: 2+0.5 per Level times Health spent. Causes damage that cannot be repaired until end of loop

bloodMagic.name: Last Breath
bloodMagic.description: Use lifeforce of dying/dead to cast spell. Range: 10+10 per Tier feet. Up to 2 per Tier characters dead within 5 min or at 0 Health. Each supplies 15% of max Health as mana. Living targets die. Check difficulty: 1/6 of mana supplied

cryomancy.name: Ice Shards
cryomancy.description: Sharp icicles fired at enemies. Mana Cost: 2.5+1 per Level per icicle. Cast Time: 80-8 per Tier TU (min 8). Range: 40+8 per Level feet. Max icicles: 3+1 per Tier. Damage: 5+3 per Level Piercing, 3+1.5 per Level Cold. Can channel after cast

cryomancy.name: Create Ice Construct
cryomancy.description: Create simple ice construct. Mana Cost: 5 per cubic foot. Cast Time: 10-2 per Tier TU per cubic foot (min 0.5). Range: 10+5 per Tier feet. Max: 3+2 per Level cubic feet

cryomancy.name: Ice Lance
cryomancy.description: Massive sharp ice lance. Requires Cryomancy Level 3. Mana Cost: 15+5 per Level. Cast Time: 100-10 per Tier TU (min 10). Range: 50+10 per Level feet. Damage: 24+12 per Level Piercing, 8+4 per Level Cold. AP: 10+8 per Tier vs Physical

cryomancy.name: Ice Coffin
cryomancy.description: Form ice around target to freeze them. Channeled. Mana Cost: 7 per Tier per 10 TU. Cast Time: 100-10 per Tier TU (min 10). Range: 80+20 per Tier feet. Reduces Movement Speed by 0.25-0.5+0.25-0.5 per Tier initially and per 10 TU channeled

divination.name: Locator
divination.description: Locate familiar people or objects. Mana Cost: 5 per Level. Cast Time: 600 TU. Radius: 1 mile per Level centered on caster

divination.name: Past Reconstruction
divination.description: Reconstruct immediate past of area. Mana Cost: 10 per Level. Cast Time: 2000 TU. Becomes more accurate and goes further back at higher Levels

electromancy.name: Electric Armor
electromancy.description: Shroud self in electricity. Channeled. Mana Cost: 9+3 per Level per 40 TU. Cast Time: 40-6 per Tier TU. Every 10 TU: attack target within 10+5 per Tier feet for 4+1.5 per Level Electric damage. Also triggers as Reaction when attacked

electromancy.name: Lightning Strike
electromancy.description: Bolt of lightning. Mana Cost: 35+16 per Level. Cast Time: 110-11 per Tier TU (min 11). Range: 80+40 per Tier feet. Damage: 40+16 per Level Electric. Interrupts target by 15 TU

electromancy.name: Spark
electromancy.description: Bundle of electrical energy. Mana Cost: 11+3 per Level. Cast Time: 70-10 per Tier TU (min 5). Range: 25+3 per Level feet. Damage: 7+4 per Level Electric. Interrupts by 8 TU

enhancement.name: Perception Enhancement
enhancement.description: Perceive supernaturally quickly. Channeled. Mana Cost: 10+6 per Level per 100 TU. Cast Time: 30-3 per Tier TU (min 3). Range: 8+8 per Tier feet. Acts as Enhancer for Reaction Checks

enhancement.name: Strength Enhancement
enhancement.description: Become supernaturally strong. Channeled. Mana Cost: 12+7 per Level per 100 TU. Cast Time: 40-4 per Tier TU (min 4). Range: 8+8 per Tier feet. Physical weapons +20% base damage +10% per Level. Unarmed +50% base +25% per Level

enhancement.name: Swiftness Enhancement
enhancement.description: Become supernaturally fast. Channeled. Mana Cost: 7+4 per Level per 100 TU. Cast Time: 20-2 per Tier TU (min 2). Range: 8+8 per Tier feet. +3-5 Movement Speed +2-4 per Level

golemancy.name: Create Golem
golemancy.description: Create a golem. Power varies with Level, size, and materials. Requires substantial time, mana, and resources. Combat-grade materials restricted. Uses casters physical combat Skills

illusion.name: Invisibility
illusion.description: Make target invisible. Channeled. Mana Cost: 3 per Tier per 600 TU. Minor visual distortion decreases with Level. Ineffective vs smell/sound perception. Acts as Enhancer to Stealth Checks

medicalMagic.name: Diagnose
medicalMagic.description: Determine what ails patient. Vulnerable. Sub-Skill of both Divination and Medical Magic. Mana Cost: 20. Cast Time: 3000-400 per Level TU (min 40)

medicalMagic.name: Heal
medicalMagic.description: Peak of medical magic, heal superficial wounds. Requires Medical Magic Level 5. Mana Cost: 30. Cast Time: 600 TU. Range: 5 feet. Heals max 15+5 per Tier Health. Cannot use twice on same target until fully healed

medicalMagic.name: Locate Pathogens
medicalMagic.description: Locate disease sources nearby. Sub-Skill of both Divination and Medical Magic. Mana Cost: 10+5 per Level. Cast Time: 600 TU. Radius: 1+0.5 per Level miles

mentalDefense.name: Mind Blank
mentalDefense.description: Completely nullify Mind Magic influence. Channeled. Max Level 5. Requires Mental Defense Level 4. Mana Cost: 25/Hour. Cast Time: 600 TU. Auto-succeed vs Mind Magic. Causes paranoid delusions with extensive use

mentalDefense.name: Mind Shield
mentalDefense.description: Protect from Mind Magic. Channeled. Mana Cost: 10/Hour. Cast Time: 60-20 per Tier TU (min 5)

mindMagic.name: Dominate
mindMagic.description: Take control of targets mind. Channeled. Mana Cost: 40/Hour per Tier. Cast Time: 6000 TU. Range: 30 feet. Humans get +5 effective Mental Defense Level. Dominated must stay within 300 feet

mindMagic.name: Mind Spike
mindMagic.description: Simple mental attack disrupting focus. Mana Cost: 9+4 per Level. Cast Time: 60-10 per Tier TU (min 8). Range: 50+10 per Level feet. Target loses 6+3 per Level focus

mindMagic.name: Read Memory
mindMagic.description: Dive into targets memories. Channeled, Vulnerable. Both user and target unconscious. Mana Cost: 60/Hour. Cast Time: 6000 TU. Range: 5 feet. Higher Levels read older memories, bypass mental defenses

mindMagic.name: Read Mind
mindMagic.description: Read surface thoughts. Channeled, Subtle. Mana Cost: 10 per 1200 TU. Cast Time: 100-30 per Tier TU. Range: 20+10 per Level feet. Lower Levels more likely to fail/alert target

mindMagic.name: Sleep
mindMagic.description: Put target to sleep. Channeled, Vulnerable. Mana Cost: 15+5 per Tier per 30 TU. Cast Time: 120-20 per Tier TU (min 10). Range: 60+20 per Level feet. Target in magical sleep cannot wake while channeled

projection.name: Magic Weapon
projection.description: Coat weapon in magic, changing damage type. Channeled. Mana Cost: 0.2 per damage dealt. Cast Time: 1 TU. Increases weapon damage by 10% per Level

projection.name: Heat Beam
projection.description: Focused beam of extreme heat. Mana Cost: 12+4 per Level. Cast Time: 40-4 per Tier TU (min 4). Range: 5+1 per Level feet. Damage: 15+7.5 per Level Heat

pyromancy.name: Fireball
pyromancy.description: Explosive fire spell. Requires Pyromancy Level 3. Mana Cost: 38+18 per Level. Cast Time: 120-12 per Tier TU (min 5). Range: 100+40 per Tier feet. Radius: 7.5+2.5 per Tier feet. Damage: 15+5 per Level Blunt, 10+5 per Level Heat

pyromancy.name: Firebolt
pyromancy.description: Simple fiery projectile. Mana Cost: 7+2 per Level. Cast Time: 50-5 per Tier TU (min 2). Range: 40+6 per Level feet. Damage: 7+5 per Level Fire

pyromancy.name: Flamethrower
pyromancy.description: Spill flame from hands. Channeled, Focused. Mana Cost: 8+4 per Level per 10 TU. Cast Time: 30-4 per Tier TU (min 3). Cone: 8+4 per Tier width, 12+6 per Tier length (2:3 ratio). Damage: 6+3 per Level Fire per 10 TU or when moving through

shaping.name: Mana Field
shaping.description: Spread mana net for perception. Channeled. Mana Cost: 4+2 per Tier per 300 TU. Cast Time: 5-1 per Tier TU (min 1). Range: 10+5 per Level feet. Perceive everything in area including wards and spell effects

shaping.name: Mana Sense
shaping.description: Sense mana flows detecting wards and effects. Requires Shaping Level 3, Perception Level 4. Range: 20 feet per Level. Higher Levels yield higher sensitivity

shaping.name: Multicasting
shaping.description: Form multiple spells at once. Requires Shaping Level 5. Cast up to 2 spells +1 at Adept +1 at Grandmaster. +1 more with Vulnerable tag. Check difficulty: spell Level*(1.5+0.5 per successive spell). Must have Level 4+ in each spell beyond first

spatialMagic.name: Blink
spatialMagic.description: Quick short range teleport. Requires Spatial Magic Level 3. Mana Cost: 20+5 per Level. Cast Time: 50-5 per Level TU (min 3). Range: 50+20 per Level feet (+100 per Level above 7)

spatialMagic.name: Blink Other
spatialMagic.description: Use Blink to move targets. Objects <100+50 per Tier lbs. Characters get contested Check to resist +3 effective Levels, may apply full Shaping

spatialMagic.name: Dimensional Gate
spatialMagic.description: Portal linking two points via pocket dimension. Channeled, Vulnerable. Requires Spatial Magic Level 6. Mana Cost: 1000/Hour. Cast Time: 600 TU. Line of sight only unless synchronized by two casters

spatialMagic.name: Recall
spatialMagic.description: Teleport to pre-prepared anchor. Mana Cost: 30. Cast Time: 100-10 per Level TU. Range: 5 miles per Level. Bring 1 per Tier people in contact

spatialMagic.name: Reactive Blink
spatialMagic.description: Use Blink as Reaction if castable in <10 TU. Only Reactive Blink Level used for contested Check to avoid attack

spatialMagic.name: Reactive Spatial Manipulation
spatialMagic.description: Create small zones of expanded/shrunken space as Reaction. Max radius reduced by factor of 5. Acts as Enhancer to Reaction Skills. Cost minimum: 10 mana. Max Tier when casting = Reactive Spatial Manipulation Tier. Contested Check to cast in time

spatialMagic.name: Spatial Expansion/Reduction
spatialMagic.description: Create zone of expanded/contracted space. Channeled. Mana Cost: 5-0.5 per Tier (min 1) per foot radius per 10 TU. Cast Time: 100-10 per Tier TU (min 1). Max radius: 3+2 per Level feet. Range: 50+25 per Tier feet. Space multiplied/divided by 3+1 per Tier factor. Collapse damage: 3*radius*ceiling(TU open/30) Blunt in 2*radius*ceiling(TU open/50) area

spatialMagic.name: Teleportation
spatialMagic.description: Move to familiar location. Vulnerable. Requires Spatial Magic Level 3, Divination Level 3. Mana Cost: 100+30 per Level. Cast Time: 600-100 per Tier TU (min 50). Range: 50 miles per Level. Bring 1 per Tier people/equivalent mass within 10 feet

spellFormula.name: Explosive Glyph
spellFormula.description: Glyph that explodes when mana channeled. Must be physically inscribed. Mana Cost: 50 per Level. Cast Time: 6000 TU. Activate range: 10+5 per Level feet in 5 TU. Damage: 50+25 per Level Blunt in 10+5 per Level area

warding.name: Alarm Ward
warding.description: Trigger alarm or mental notification. Channeled, Vulnerable. Can trigger other wards. Mana Cost: 5 per Level. Cast Time: 3000 TU. Max radius: 10+5 per Tier feet

warding.name: Anti-Shaping Ward
warding.description: Limit ability to shape mana. Channeled, Vulnerable. Mana Cost: 100 per Level. Cast Time: 36000 TU. Max radius: 15+10 per Level feet. Reduces effective Shaping by 1 per Ward Level. Daily upkeep = ward cost

warding.name: Explosive Ward
warding.description: Ward designed to explode on condition. Mana Cost: 50 per Level. Cast Time: 6000 TU. Damage: 50+25 per Level Blunt in 10+5 per Level area

warding.name: Ward Breaking
warding.description: Break targeted ward. Channeled, Vulnerable. Knowledge of ward makes easier. Mana Cost: 5 per ward Level. Cast time varies by ward Level and user Skill

alchemy.name: Create Alchemists Fire
alchemy.description: Molotov explosive fiery concoction. Radius: 10+5 per Tier feet. Damage: 10+4 per Tier Blunt, 10+4 per Tier Fire. Burning residue: 8+4 per Tier Fire/25 TU. GP: 15d/25c/60c/120b/200a

alchemy.name: Create Healing Potion
alchemy.description: Healing potion for quick wound repair. Requires Alchemy Level 5. Heals 20 Health per Tier. GP: 20d/40d/70c/120c/160c

alchemy.name: Create Healing Salve
alchemy.description: Basic salve preventing infection and improving recovery. Max Level 1. GP: 0d

alchemy.name: Create Potion of Armor
alchemy.description: Protection against specific damage type. Requires Alchemy Level 4. Duration: 2 hours. Improves Armor by 4 per Level. Each type separate skill. GP: 1d/10d/20c/50c/100b

alchemy.name: Create Potion of Mental Acuity
alchemy.description: Process information faster for study/research/combat. Duration: 10 min per Tier. GP: 10c/40c/80b/140b/200a

alchemy.name: Create Potion of Strength
alchemy.description: Makes imbiber substantially stronger. Duration: 1 hour. Physical weapons +20% base +10% per Level. Unarmed +50% base +25% per Level. May break unenhanced weapons. GP: 8d/30c/60c/100b/160b

alchemy.name: Create Potion of Swiftness
alchemy.description: Improves movement speed. Duration: 1 hour. +2/4 Movement Speed per Tier. GP: 5d/20d/35d/60d/90c

alchemy.name: Create Pyre Coating
alchemy.description: Sticky substance heating when exposed to air. Duration: 1 hour. +15% heat damage per Tier. Burning: 3*Tier. May melt weapon. GP: 25c/45c/90c/130b/250a

alchemy.name: Create Smoke Bomb
alchemy.description: Obscure area with smoke. Duration: 1800 TU. Radius: 10+5 per Level feet. Stealth +2+1 per Level in area. GP: 0d/0d/3c/20c/50c

alchemy.name: Create Transformation Potion
alchemy.description: Transform into creature whose organs were used. Requires Alchemy Level 2 (Level 4+ for magical creatures). Duration: 1 hour per Tier. Ingredients: 1 corpse per 4+ doses. GP: 10+c+ depending on creature

alchemy.name: Create Poison
alchemy.description: Magical poison via contact/wound. Efficacy varies with Skill Level and ingredient quality. Variable ingredients and GP cost

alchemy.name: Create Poison Gas
alchemy.description: Bottle of magical poison gas. Efficacy varies with Skill Level and ingredient quality. Variable ingredients and GP cost

alchemy.name: Debilitating Gas
alchemy.description: Thick gray gas causing disorientation/nausea. Radius: 10 feet per Tier. -2 effective total Level per Tier in gas. Effect lasts 1 hour if in gas 200+ TU. GP: 10c/20c/40c/80b

alchemy.name: Dreambane Poison
alchemy.description: Causes fitful sleep. Applied by imbibing/injecting/weapon. Sleep after 500/350/200 TU by tier. GP: 10c/40c/100c

alchemy.name: Miasmora Toxin
alchemy.description: Fast-acting magical poison gas. Black color. Radius: 15+10 per Tier feet. 5+5 per Tier poison damage per 100 TU for 2000 TU. Half movement speed. +5 Stealth in smog. Double difficulty to create vs target level. GP: 40b/80b/160a

alchemy.name: Viridia Poison
alchemy.description: Simple fast-acting cutting poison. 5 poison damage per 250/125 TU for 6000 TU by tier. GP: 5c/10c

swords.name: Swords
swords.description: The user is experienced in wielding swords. Domain Skill for Skills used with swords

daggers.name: Daggers
daggers.description: The user is skilled in wielding daggers to deadly effect. Acts as Enhancer to melee Skills used with daggers and knives. Reduces Time by 10% per Tier

clubs.name: Clubs
clubs.description: The user knows how best to hurt people with a big stick. Acts as Enhancer to Skills used with clubs, maces, and warhammers

axes.name: Axes
axes.description: The user is experienced with axes and hatchets. Acts as Enhancer to Skills used with axes

shields.name: Shields
shields.description: The user is skilled in defensive and offensive shield use. Acts as Enhancer to Skills used with shields

bows.name: Bows
bows.description: The user is deadly accurate with bows and crossbows. Acts as Enhancer to Skills used with bows and crossbows

throwing.name: Throwing
throwing.description: The user is Skilled in accurately hurling objects. Domain Skill for throwing attacks

unarmed.name: Unarmed Combat
unarmed.description: The user is experienced in fighting with naught but their own body. Enhancer to physical melee Skills used without weapon. +10% +5% per Level base damage. Base human unarmed: 10 Blunt

stab.name: Stab
stab.description: The user attacks with a piercing melee weapon. Time: 40-4 per Level TU (min 4). Damage: 70% weapon (Piercing)+17.5% per Tier

slash.name: Slash
slash.description: The user attacks with a slashing weapon. Time: 65-6.5 per Level TU (min 6.5). Damage: 90% weapon (Slashing)+20% per Tier

bludgeon.name: Bludgeon
bludgeon.description: The user hits a target with a blunt weapon. Time: 90-8 per Level TU (min 8). Damage: 145% weapon (blunt)+35% per Tier

overheadSlash.name: Overhead Slash
overheadSlash.description: The user makes a massive overhead strike with a slashing weapon. Time: 120-12 per Level TU (min 12). Damage: 160% weapon (Slashing)+40% per Tier

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: The user makes a wide slash with their weapon. Time: 80-8 per Level TU (min 8). Damage: 75% weapon (Slashing)+18% per Tier. Hits any number of targets in front of the user within an ~135 degree arc

nick.name: Nick
nick.description: The user makes an extremely quick strike with a slashing or piercing melee weapon. Time: 10-1 per Level TU (min 1). Damage: 40% weapon (Piercing)+10% per Tier

hiltStrike.name: Hilt Strike
hiltStrike.description: The user strikes with the hilt of their weapon. Time: 10-1 per Level TU (min 1). Damage: 6 Blunt damage+2.5 per Tier

knock.name: Knock
knock.description: The user uses their fist or a blunt weapon to attempt to knock the target prone. Time: 80-6 per Level TU. Damage: 85% weapon (blunt)+20% per Tier. If this attack deals damage equal to at least 20% of the targets Health, the target is knocked prone

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: The user knows how to deflect incoming attacks. Reaction. Only works on attacks with a Physical component. Can only fully negate attacks with total damage â‰¤8 per Level. A successful Parry against higher damage will negate 20% of the damage, before Armor is applied

block.name: Block
block.description: The user blocks an attack with a shield or more durable part of their body. Reaction. Increases Armor against the attack by 30%+10% per Level above 1

shieldBash.name: Shield Bash
shieldBash.description: Offensive strike with shield edge or boss. Time: 70-7 per Level TU (min 7). Damage: 120% shield damage (Blunt)+25% per Tier. Can interrupt enemy actions

counterSlash.name: Counter Slash
counterSlash.description: The user attacks quickly with a slashing weapon as a counter attack. Time: Instant. Damage: 35% weapon (Slashing)+8% per Tier. Use upon successfully Parrying an attack. Increases Interruption from Parry by 10-1 per Level Time Units

eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
eviscerate.description: The user uses a bladed weapon to inflict a bleeding gash on their target. Time: 45-4.5 per Level TU (min 4.5). Damage: 50% weapon (piercing)+15% per Tier. Inflicts a stack of Bleeding on the target on dealing damage

rendArmor.name: Rend Armor
rendArmor.description: The user attacks with a slashing weapon to exploit a weakness in a targets armor and create an opening for attack. Time: 60-6 per Level TU (min 6). Damage: 60% weapon (slashing)+15% per Tier. If at least 20% of the total damage of Rend Armor breaches the targets Armor, the targets Physical Armor is reduced by 3 per Tier until repaired. May be ineffective against certain armors

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: The user sprints at an opponent and attacks with their fists or a melee weapon. Damage: 16% weapon damage (any Physical)+4.5% per Level above 1 per 11 feet of sprinting with a reasonably straight heading prior to use, maxing after 55 feet. Usable only when the user slows to normal speed from sprint. Time to use may be delayed indefinitely, in increments of 5 Time Units

shoulderCheck.name: Shoulder Check
shoulderCheck.description: The user slams into an opponent after sprinting. Ineffective on larger opponents. Damage: 5 Blunt base+3 Blunt per Level per 11 feet of sprinting with reasonably straight heading prior to use, maxing after 44 feet. If the user is substantially larger than the target, damage is increased by 50% and the target is knocked Prone. Deals 40% of damage to the user from recoil, before the 50% increase

blinkStrike.name: Blink Strike
blinkStrike.description: The user strikes quickly with a melee weapon after coming out from the Blink Spell. Time: Instant. Damage: 20% weapon damage (any Physical)+5% per Tier above Novice

shootArrow.name: Shoot Arrow
shootArrow.description: The user loads/draws and fires an arrow from a bow or crossbow. Time: 80-6 per Level TU (min 8). Range: base. Damage: 100% weapon damage (Piercing)+12% per Level above 1

throwDagger.name: Throw Dagger
throwDagger.description: The user can accurately throw their daggers to deadly effect. Time: 30-7 per Level TU (min 2). Range: 20+5 per Tier feet. Damage: 40% weapon damage (piercing)+10% per Tier

throwPotion.name: Throw Potion
throwPotion.description: The user can accurately throw potions, shattering them against surfaces or enemies to deadly effect. Time: 50-5 per Tier TU (min 5). Range: 20+10 per Level feet

unarmedStrike.name: Unarmed Strike
unarmedStrike.description: The user attacks with only their natural weapons. Time: 30-5 per Tier TU (min 6). Damage: 80% weapon damage (any physical)+12% per Level above 1

generalSkills.name: Perception
generalSkills.description: The user is experienced in detecting the hidden and unseen

generalSkills.name: Stealth
generalSkills.description: The user knows how to quiet their steps and remain hidden

generalSkills.name: Survival
generalSkills.description: Enhancer for wilderness survival Skills, such as foraging, fire starting, and hunting

generalSkills.name: Disease Analysis
generalSkills.description: Advanced talent in identifying and tracking the progression of diseases, whether mundane or magical

generalSkills.name: Evasive Maneuvers
generalSkills.description: The user is skilled in avoiding incoming attacks. Reaction

generalSkills.name: Focused Defense
generalSkills.description: The user focuses purely on defending themselves. Time: 10-1 per Level TU (min 1). After being active for 10-1 per Level TU, may be used as an Enhancer to all Reaction Skills used

generalSkills.name: Body Block
generalSkills.description: The user attempts to interpose themselves between an attack and a nearby ally. Reaction. The user must make separate contested checks for Body Block and any mitigation attempts

generalSkills.name: Dash
generalSkills.description: The user knows how to run efficiently and has experience pushing their limits in a flat out sprint. Once per 300 Time Units, the user may increase their sprint speed by 50%+10% per Level above 1 for 15 Time Units+5 per Level above 1. Max Level 6

generalSkills.name: Disease Resistant
generalSkills.description: The holder is supernaturally resistant to disease

generalSkills.name: Physical Combat Ineptitude
